ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_women] Digest Number 117
ygData.msgSnippet: ... here ya go - i get that irl =P ... i ve always been told the lookout tower in the middle of lake rathe ... as a bard, our little thing to be begged for is
ygData.messageBody:
>> I envy you being a 14 lv druid, when I tell people I am ONLY lv 6,
>> nobody wants to group with me! :(
>
>That is sick. I can't belive folks would do that.

here ya go - i get that irl >=P


>My in-game fiance (hey...THAT is a great topic, in-game marriages...anyone
>know of a good place in Norrath to tie the knot?)

i've always been told the lookout tower in the middle of lake rathe

>Hey...Ranalla, you mentioned that everyone was shouting for SoWs when you
>were in fp when you got to 14. My Barb Shaman (Kalara on the Veeshan server)
>got her SoW spell at lvl 9 and ever since then I've essentially been a SoW
>whore (lol might be a bit crude, but apt). The big difference now that i'm
>lvl 21 is that no one pays me for the SoW. They just come up to me (and
>pretty soon you'll know what I mean...they'll come up, sort of stand there
>and before they can ask for the SoW I am already mid-spell to just get them
>to go away). They literally assume that it is for free, say thanks and walk
>away. Drives me nuts when they do it right after I've just fought a mob, am
>at half-life, oom and my party is the same or worse. That's usually the only
>time that I'll turn them down.

as a bard, our little thing to be begged for is corpse loc. thing is, unlike
just standing there and casting, we have to 1) wait for the (usually)whiner
to eventually get to us or run around while we try to find them. 2) have
them DEMAND that we protect them (never mind that everything is kos to them,
and they're lev 5 in a 16 dungeon with not armor (or something like that. 3)
go hunting for their body (and finally figure out that there are two corpses
in the zone (at least) and so you have to figure out which direction to
actually go. 4) HAVE to sit there while they loot 5) escort them back to
safety (since we've already bent over backwards, how dare we say no, now)
and 6)get no thanks, no reimbursement for the time/effort/stress - even
though they said they would pay.

a load of crap. i was getting harassed for it a long time before i got the
song. when i ask people, i go - can i buy a sow/breeze off of you so i can
run to town/practise skills. i don't just demand it and i always pay. i try
to give 1pp as that's usually more than i can afford. i try to give total
and utter appreciation (and try to make them smile too) for anyone who helps
me. just like i'm perfectly willing to go cure a zone of disease *G*

anyways...slight tangent *Grins*

i was playing my cleric last night - just hit lev 15 *beams* that would be 5
levels in 3 days of my playing, 15 levels in 3 days of eq reckonning. i'm
NOT a powerleveler or even a super twink. by my figuring, all my gear i
would be able to buy myself by now. but just goes to show you the power of a
damn good group. i was so lucky - i got great groups 4 out of 5 times. and
the bad group just wouldn't share loot.

i'm just so happy i thought i would share it with you. *grins*

oh yeah - being a de, and loosing my lev b/c of this....how does one up your
faction with druids?

anerak
14/5 cleric

lynnara starspinner
24/5 bard
